description: A mysterious fog that serves as a gateway to another dimension called Ape's Concert. The Rainbow Mist is a time-distorted space that traps ships and creates temporal paradoxes. Time behaves abnormally within it, and the dimension can send those who escape it to different time periods.

keyEvents.title: Rainbow Mist Begins to Collapse
keyEvents.description: The Rainbow Mist dimension destabilizes and begins collapsing after the destruction of the Rainbow Tower.
keyEvents.significance: The collapse forces an immediate evacuation and sets up the time-travel mechanism.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Escape the Rainbow Mist
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry successfully escapes the collapsing Rainbow Mist and returns to normal space.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the resolution of the immediate crisis and the crew's survival.

keyEvents.title: Rainbow Mist Collapses Completely
keyEvents.description: The dimension tears itself apart, sending the Pumpkin Pirates fifty years into the past.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the stable time loop that explains the entire arc's plot.

statusHistory.reason: Dimension was accessible through the Rainbow Tower
Collapsed after the Rainbow Tower was destroyed

description: A dimension within the Rainbow Mist that serves as a ship graveyard. It's filled with wrecked ships from various time periods and features a space loop that returns anything to its starting point. Time passes differently here, and it was home to the Pumpkin Pirates for many years.

keyEvents.title: Ape's Concert Begins to Collapse
keyEvents.description: The dimension destabilizes and starts tearing itself apart.
keyEvents.significance: Forces the evacuation and creates the episode's main crisis.

keyEvents.title: Escape Route Discovered
keyEvents.description: Rapanui spots sunlight breaking through and identifies the escape route.
keyEvents.significance: Provides the solution to escaping the collapsing dimension.

statusHistory.reason: Dimension existed within the Rainbow Mist

description: An island in Paradise that was ruled by the tyrannical former pirate Wetton, who imposed heavy taxes on citizens to fund the construction of the Rainbow Tower. The island is home to scientist Henzo and was the childhood home of the Pumpkin Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Time Travel Twist Revealed
keyEvents.description: The Marines reveal themselves to be the adult Pumpkin Pirates who were thrown fifty years into the past.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic revelation that ties together the entire arc's plot.

keyEvents.title: Wetton Arrested
keyEvents.description: Mayor Wetton is arrested by the Marines, liberating Ruluka Island from his tyranny.
keyEvents.significance: Provides justice and frees the island from corruption.

keyEvents.title: Ship Falls from Sky
keyEvents.description: A massive ship falls from the sky near Ruluka Island, shocking the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: First concrete evidence of Sky Island and setup for the Jaya Arc.

statusHistory.reason: Island continues to exist, now freed from Wetton's rule

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. In this episode, the ship sustains considerable damage while escaping the collapsing Rainbow Mist.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Escapes Rainbow Mist
keyEvents.description: Powered by the explosion from Rapanui's sacrifice, the Going Merry bursts through the dimensional barrier and returns to normal space, sustaining considerable damage.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's damage foreshadows its ongoing deterioration that will become a major plot point later.

statusHistory.reason: Sustained damage escaping the Rainbow Mist

description: An abandoned Marine warship found within Ape's Concert. The Pumpkin Pirates took shelter on this ship while trapped in the dimension. In Episode 143, Rapanui Pasqua sacrifices it by detonating the ship to create wind for the Going Merry's escape.

keyEvents.title: Tarielishin Destroyed
keyEvents.description: Rapanui detonates the Marine warship Tarielishin, sacrificing it to create the wind needed to propel the Going Merry to safety.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's destruction is a heroic sacrifice that saves the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: Ship was derelict in Ape's Concert

description: A massive tower constructed on Ruluka Island by Wetton using funds from exploitative taxes. The tower was designed to create a bridge to the Rainbow Mist dimension. Its destruction in the previous episode triggered the collapse of the Rainbow Mist.

statusHistory.reason: Destroyed in Episode 142, triggering the Rainbow Mist's collapse
